llm_res.rule: transfer: Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
symbol - Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.

The contract should not include any functions that allow arbitrary removal or destruction of tokens without owner's explicit approval or action (e.g., the Death function violates user's expectations of ERC20 token behavior).
